greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of m such that m + (product of digits of m) equals n.
comment: Number of times n appears in A230099.
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
maple: for i from 0 to ctmax do ct[i]:=Array(0..M); od:
for n from 0 to M do
for i from 1 to M do h:=lis2[i];
if h <= ctmax then ct[h]:=[op(ct[h]),i]; fi; od:
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, return(1)); sum(k=1, n, k+vecprod(digits(k)) == n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 18 2020
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 13 2013
